alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 8:39PM CDT until August 29 at 3:32AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Chunky River Near Chunky affecting Lauderdale and Newton Counties. Leaf River At Hattiesburg affecting Forrest County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Flood water crosses River Road, County Road 320 near Longs Fish Camp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.5 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 28.6 Thu 8 pm CDT 35.5 30.3 21.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 845 AM CDT.
